data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 435,900 people living in the state of Tel Aviv.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tel Aviv, Israel
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Tel Aviv, Israel a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 144 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Tel Aviv words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Tel Aviv, Israel to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Spirit, I pray that the Yudi, Tripolita'it people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Tel Aviv, Israel from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Tel Aviv to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary:
the state of Tel Aviv, Israel has a population of 435,900.

We estimate Tel Aviv has 3,024 people who might know Jesus, 4,504 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 428,372 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 144 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Tel Aviv, Israel who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.
